00011 MMLmfenced::MMLmfenced(MMLDocument *o)
00012         : MMLElement(MML::MFENCED, o) {
00013 
00014         if (!defset[id]) {
00015                 defset[id] = true;
00016                 const MMLAttribute **da = defatt[id];
00017                 using namespace MML;
00018                 MML::createAttribute(MML::OPEN, "(", id, da);
00019                 MML::createAttribute(MML::CLOSE, ")", id, da);
00020                 MML::createAttribute(MML::SEPARATORS, ",", id, da);
00021         }
00022 }
00023 #include <list>
00024 bool
00025 MMLmfenced::validate() {
00026         if (validated) {
00027                 return valid;
00028         }
00029         validated = true;
00030         validateChildren(-1);
00031         if (!valid) return false;
00032 
00033         // for now, the implementation is rather expensive: instead of checking
00034         // the existing inferred elements, we just remove all of them and start
00035         // anew
00036 
00037         // the mfenced element should always have one inferred mrow.
00038         // if it doesn't have this, we create it
00039         MMLNode *mrow;
00040         if (!first || first != last || !first->isInferred()
00041                 || first->nodeName() != MML::elementTag[MML::MROW]) {
00042                 mrow = owner->createInferredmrow(this);
00043                 appendChild(mrow);
00044         } else {
00045                 mrow = first;
00046         }
00047 
00048         // the first element must be an inferred mo element and the text in
00049         // the element must correspond to the attribute 'open'
00050         MMLmo *mo;
00051         if (!getFirst(mrow)
00052                 || getFirst(mrow)->nodeName() != MML::elementTag[MML::MO]
00053                 || !mrow->isInferred()) {
00054                 mo = owner->createInferredmo("(");
00055                 mrow->insertBefore(mo, getFirst(mrow));
00056         }
00057 
00058         // now node points to the last child of mrow
00059         // this node must be an inferred mo element
00060         MMLNode *node = getLast(mrow);
00061         if (!node || !node->isInferred() || node == getFirst(mrow)
00062                 || node->nodeName() != MML::elementTag[MML::MO]) {
00063                 mo = owner->createInferredmo(")");
00064                 mrow->appendChild(mo);
00065         }
00066 
00067         return valid;
00068 }
00069 ushort
00070 MMLmfenced::getSeparator(short i, const DOMString &s) const {
00071         uint spos = 0;
00072         short nsep = -1;
00073         ushort cursep = ' ';
00074         for (spos=0; nsep < i && spos < s.length(); ++spos) {
00075                 if (!DOMString::isWhitespace(s[spos])) {
00076                         cursep = s[spos];
00077                         ++nsep;
00078                 }
00079         }
00080         return cursep;
00081 }
00082 void
00083 MMLmfenced::setSeparators(const DOMString &s) const {
00084         short nsep = 0;
00085         MMLNode *node = getNext(getFirst(first));
00086         MMLNode *mlast = first->lastChild();
00087         MMLNode *sep = getNext(node);
00088         if (DOMString::isWhitespace(getSeparator(nsep, s))) {
00089                 // remove all separator mo elements
00090                 while (node && node != mlast) {
00091                         sep = getNext(node);
00092                         if (node->isInferred()) {
00093                                 first->removeChild(node);
00094                                 node = sep;
00095                         } else {
00096                                 node = getNext(node);
00097                         }
00098                 }
00099         } else {
00100                 while (node && node != mlast) {
00101                         sep = getNext(node);
00102                         if (node->isInferred()) {
00103                                 first->removeChild(node);
00104                                 node = sep;
00105                         } else if (!sep->isInferred()) {
00106                                 DOMString cs;
00107                                 cs += getSeparator(nsep++, s);
00108                                 MMLNode *mo = owner->createInferredmo(cs);
00109                                 first->insertBefore(mo, sep);
00110                                 node = sep;
00111                         } else {
00112                                 node = getNext(sep);
00113                         }
00114                 }
00115         }
00116 }
00117 void
00118 MMLmfenced::doLayout(MML::Attributes *a) const {
00119         MMLText *text = static_cast<MMLText *>(getFirst(getFirst(first)));
00120         text->setData(a->open());
00121         text = static_cast<MMLText *>(getFirst(getLast(first)));
00122         text->setData(a->close());
00123         setSeparators(a->separators());
00124         // if the attribute 'separator' is empty or contains only whitespace,
00125         // the separator mo elements should be removed
00126 
00127         const MMLNode *n = first;
00128         n->layout(a);
00129         gui->width = n->getWidth();
00130         gui->ascent = n->getAscent();
00131         gui->descent = n->getDescent();
00132 }
00133 void
00134 MMLmfenced::doPaint(MML::Attributes *a) const {
00135         first->paint(a);
00136 }
